body: Anyone else notice that " The original Jungle " map is almost never played, and if you look at the open walls servers that map is just sitting there.... I hate it when everyone leaves a map....  Just a thought if we could replace it with something else....
body_tagged: Anyone else notice that " The original Jungle " map is almost never played, and if you look at the open walls servers that map is just sitting there.... I hate it when everyone leaves a map....  Just a thought if we could replace it with something else....
title: The Walls " Jungle" Remove please?

replies.body: Simply talk to the MapDev's via skype.
replies.body_tagged: Simply talk to the MapDev's via skype.

replies.body:
Instead of removing it from the rotation, maybe you could IMPROVE it,
Jungle 2.0.

  Here are ideas:
* Add a potion stand
* Add netherwart to soul sand cave and spider eyes to chest
* Add sand or glass bottles
* Add other potion ingredients like blazerod, redstone, glowstone, gunpower
* Add a FEW diamonds in chests or found while mining
* Add more random xp bottles
* Add some other aspect to counter flame bow like more water buckets, fire resist potions, etc...
* Add a fire aspect sword somewhere
* Bring back the ability for fire to spread and burn the jungle down

@DaBaderMC - There is enough food if you get the skeleton bones in the soul sand cave, convert to bone meal, and regrow the wheat garden.

Thanks for considering these ideas!! :)

replies.body: I think the map should be taken out of rotation in it's current state ( we have an upgraded jungle with Tetris Jungle ), and it is simply not played enough to keep in rotation - in my opinion. I will reach out to a map dev. see what they have planned.@Murph - I think you want a reworked Village not a reworked Jungle :)~
